name: 1dnorm
author: AFNI Developers
description: Normalize columns of a 1D file (AFNI ASCII list of numbers)

inputs.description: Input AFNI *.1D file (ASCII list of numbers arranged in columns); if '-' input will be read from stdin.
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Output AFNI *.1D file (normalized); if '-' output will be written to stdout.
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Normalize so sum of absolute values is 1 (L_1 norm)
inputs.name: L_1 norm flag

inputs.description: Normalize so that max absolute value is 1 (L_infinity norm)
inputs.name: L_infinity norm flag

inputs.description: Subtract each column's mean before normalizing
inputs.name: Demean flag

inputs.description: Subtract each column's median before normalizing
inputs.name: Demedian flag
